user_stories.title: Automated Vulnerability Scanning
user_stories.story: As a penetration tester, I want automated vulnerability scanning that can identify security weaknesses across networks, applications, and infrastructure so that I can focus on manual testing of complex vulnerabilities.
acceptance_criteria: Scan networks for open ports and services
Prioritize findings by severity and exploitability
Integrate with popular security tools (Nmap, Nessus, Burp)

user_stories.title: Web Application Security Testing
user_stories.story: As a web security specialist, I want automated web application testing that can detect SQL injection, XSS, CSRF, and other web vulnerabilities so that I can ensure comprehensive security coverage.
acceptance_criteria: Validate input validation and output encoding

user_stories.title: Social Engineering Campaign Automation
user_stories.story: As a social engineering specialist, I want automated tools that can help design and execute phishing campaigns and social engineering tests so that I can assess human security awareness.
acceptance_criteria: Create fake websites and landing pages
Track email open rates and click-through rates

user_stories.title: Wireless Network Security Assessment
user_stories.story: As a wireless security expert, I want automated wireless network assessment tools that can identify weak encryption, rogue access points, and other wireless vulnerabilities.
acceptance_criteria: Scan for wireless networks and access points
Test encryption strength (WEP, WPA, WPA2, WPA3)

user_stories.title: Physical Security Assessment
user_stories.story: As a physical security specialist, I want tools that can assess physical security controls, access systems, and environmental security so that I can provide comprehensive security assessments.
acceptance_criteria: Test RFID and proximity card systems
